articles.title: Dodgers are in the mix for Juan Soto and can pull it off. Will they? - The Athletic
articles.description: The Dodgers have the elements to make a trade for Soto. But can they keep churning prospects for ready-made stars and preserve the future?
articles.content: LOS ANGELES A gift was waiting for Juan Soto on Monday when he walked into the visiting clubhouse at Dodger Stadium. It was hard to miss. The newly renovated room, for all its new and modern features… [+11178 chars]
